summary: 2010 DODGE JOURNEY, SHUT DOWN TWICE WHILE DRIVING. ONCE IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD GOING 20MPH, ONCE ON A HIGHWAY GOING 60.  WIFE HAD TO PULL OFF ONTO GRASS WHILE CARS ALMOST RUN HER OVER. CAR RESTARTS FINE. NOTHING REPLACED YET AS WE THOUGHT THE FIRST TIME WAS JUST A HICCUP, TAKING TO DEALER TOMORROW. *TR
